content.rendered:
Consistency

Bibledit assists with checking how consistent words have been translated in the Bible. The suggested work-flow for consistency checking is this:

* Create a Consultation Note, and enter the details of the desired consistency check, plus the passages to check.

* Open the Consistency tool in a new tab.

* Copy the passages from the Consultation Note and paste them in the Consistency tool.

* Enter the desired translation or translations in the Consistency tool.

The Consistency tool will display the verse texts from the active Bible. It will mark the translations in the verse.

To make corrections, click a Passage. The text editor will open at the correct chapter and verse.

Changes can be made in the text. The Consistency tool will display any updates in the Bible.

The Consistency tool can display extra Bibles. This assists the checking process.

Home
Review
